title: Nqek
author: Nqek
content: Would anyone be so kind to answer 4 questions in my survey for a school project?Not sure if this is the right place on the forum to ask these types of things, sorry if it isnt!https://www.survio.com/survey/d/U7P5A5G5S3N9H8H9R

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: I think this is a good place to gather information. I filled out the questionnaire for you

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Nqek on October 11, 2022, 10:30:54 AMWould anyone be so kind to answer 4 questions in my survey for a school project?Not sure if this is the right place on the forum to ask these types of things, sorry if it isnt!https://www.survio.com/survey/d/U7P5A5G5S3N9H8H9RI surgeste you put down the questions on your thread, newbies don't have much trust in the forum so lots of people might not want to click your link because of numerous phishing links/sites used by hackers.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: I took his survey on a throw-away VM, and I had no issues. Seems to be a standard survey-taking site, IMO.

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Best of luck with your project
